reporting-org.narrative: AICS - Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development

title.narrative: Agricolture and livestock Support for Syrian People phase III

description.narrative: Crisi Siriana - Programma di sostegno all'Agricoltura e all'allevamento per il popolo siriano realizzato da CIHEAM nel nord della Siria

The Programme aims to increase the agricultural and livestock production and household income of local communities, thourgh the provision of inputs and services made available by the Local Council Administrations inside Syria.
